channel.title: redding
channel.description: I'm redding, I do a lot of things, sometimes I write about them.

item.title: Blog under construction
item.description: Hi there! If you're reading this, you've wandered into the still-under-construction blog component of my website. The site's still very new and I'm still testing some things, so the rest of the blog posts here aren't super interesting. Come back soon for actual genuine redding thoughts, and not just lorem ipsum!
item.dc:creator: redding sauter
